name: PhotogrammetrySession.Configuration
desc: The configuration parameters for a photogrammetry session.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a configuration using default values.

items.name: var isObjectMaskingEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the session uses object masks.

items.name: var sampleOrdering: PhotogrammetrySession.Configuration.SampleOrdering
items.desc: The order of the image samples.
